**About the App**: This RShiny App is a supplement to the manuscript [Guttal, et al, 2016, PLOS ONE](http://dx.plos.org/10.1371/journal.pone.0144198). 

**Authors**: [Nikunj Goel](http://eeb.yale.edu/people/graduate-students/nikunj-goel) (1,2) and [Vishwesha Guttal](https://twitter.com/vishuguttal) (1)

**Affiliations**: (1) Centre for Ecological Sciences, Indian Institute of Science, Bengaluru, India. (2) Department of Ecology and Evolutionary Biology,Yale University, 06511, New Haven, USA. 

**Scientific Collaborator**: Srinivas Raghavendra, Cairnes School of Business & Economics and the Whitaker Institute at National University of Ireland (NUI), Galway, Ireland.

**Website**: [TEE-Lab](https://teelabiisc.wordpress.com/research/dynamics-of-financial-markets/)

**Source Code**: [At Github](https://github.com/nikunj410/ews_finance_app)

**Data Source**: Market data are downloaded from [Quandl Financial and Economic Data](https://www.quandl.com/collections/markets/global-stock-markets).

**Created with**: RStudio and [Shiny](http://shiny.rstudio.com/)

**Licence**: [GPL v3](http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html)

**Reference**: Guttal, Raghavendra, Goel and Hoarau, 2016, [Rising variability with no critical slowing down precede financial meltdowns](http://dx.plos.org/10.1371/journal.pone.0144198), PLOS ONE.
